page.title: 12SERVICES, SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: Another consequence of living in an isolated country district is the lack of public services,such as shops and libraries.There are several mobile vans which visit this area to meet these needs. Every Tuesday,Thursday and Saturday a baker comes to our villages.He sells bread,cakes,biscuits,crisps and sweets. A mobile van brings fruit and vegetables every Wednesday and makes special journeys if asked. Every Thursday at 6.00pm a fish and chip van stops at the crossroads in Little Somerford.This is a much used service. Once a fortnight,on a Monday a mobile library van serves the area and also calls at Hill House,the old peoples home.
